name: Dropped Item
description: Visual representation of items dropped on death or thrown by players. Can despawn after 5 minutes. Use hoppers or magnets to collect automatically.

name: Experience Orb
description: Glowing spheres providing XP for enchanting (1-11 points per orb). Merge when close together. Disappear after 5 minutes if uncollected.

name: Area Effect Cloud
description: Lingering effect from splash potions or dragon's breath. Damages entities every 0.5 seconds. Duration varies by potion type.

name: Elder Guardian
description: Ocean monument mini-boss. Inflicts Mining Fatigue III (prevents block breaking). Drops prismarine shards/crystals and wet sponge. Spawns guardian spikes on death.

name: Wither Skeleton
description: Nether fortress mob with stone swords. 2.5% chance to drop wither skull (required for Wither summoning). Immune to fire damage.

name: Stray
description: Frozen skeleton variant from snowy biomes. Shoots Slowness arrows (0:30 effect). Drops tipped arrows and bones.

name: Egg
description: Throwable chicken projectile. 1/8 chance to spawn baby chicken. No damage to entities.

name: Lead Knot
description: Leash attachment point on fences. Break by attacking to retrieve lead. Persistent unless broken.

name: Painting
description: Decorative wall item with random art (2x1 to 4x4 sizes). Place by right-clicking vertical surfaces.

name: Arrow
description: Standard projectile from bows. Can be tipped with potion effects. 1/5 chance to remain collectible after shooting.

name: Snowball
description: Throwable projectile from snow blocks. Knocks back entities but deals no damage. Can activate TNT.

name: Ghast Fireball
description: Explosive projectile from Ghasts (damage radius 3 blocks). Can be deflected with melee attacks.

name: Blaze Fireball
description: Flaming projectile from Blazes. Lights blocks on fire. 5 damage per hit (2.5 hearts).

name: Ender Pearl
description: Throwable teleportation item. Costs 2.5 hearts on use. 5% chance to spawn endermite on landing.

name: Eye of Ender
description: Navigation tool for locating Strongholds. Breaks 20% chance per use. Required to activate End Portal.

name: Splash Potion
description: Throwable potion with area effect (radius 4 blocks). Duration/strength depends on brewing ingredients.

name: Bottle o' Enchanting
description: Throwable XP source (3-11 points). Obtained from trading with cleric villagers.

name: Item Frame
description: Wall-mounted display for items/maps. Rotate items with right-click. Drops contents when broken.

name: Wither Skull
description: Projectile fired by Wither. Explodes on impact (damage 8 hearts). Blue variants bypass armor.

name: Primed TNT
description: Activated explosive with 4-second fuse. Can be ignited by redstone or fire. Destroys nearby blocks.

name: Falling Block
description: Gravity-affected blocks like sand/gravel. Deals damage if entities are crushed. Turns into item form when landing.

name: Firework Rocket
description: Launchable fireworks. Duration depends on gunpowder. Essential for elytra boosting (3s boost per rocket).

name: Husk
description: Desert zombie variant. Inflicts Hunger (0:30 effect). Doesn't burn in sunlight. Drops sand occasionally.

name: Spectral Arrow
description: Glowing arrow from crafting with glowstone. Reveals target through walls (10s duration). No direct damage bonus.

name: Shulker Bullet
description: Homing projectile from Shulkers. Applies Levitation (10s). Can be destroyed with attacks.

name: Dragon Fireball
description: Ender Dragon's explosive attack. Creates lingering damage cloud. Breaks most blocks on impact.

name: Zombie Villager
description: Curable zombie variant. Splash with Weakness + feed golden apple to cure. Retains original profession.

name: Skeleton Horse
description: Undead horse spawned during thunderstorms. 0.75% chance from lightning strike. Immune to drowning.

name: Zombie Horse
description: Unridable undead horse. Only spawns via commands or mods. Immune to fire/fall damage.

name: Armor Stand
description: Customizable display for armor/tools. Use redstone to pose. Survives in lava but burns in fire.

name: Donkey
description: Rideable mob with 15 inventory slots. Breed with golden apples/carrots. Slower than horses but can wear chests.

name: Mule
description: Donkey-horse hybrid. 15 inventory slots. Cannot breed. Immune to zombie infections.

name: Evocation Fangs
description: Attack summoned by Evokers. Deals 6 damage (3 hearts). Passes through shields. Avoid by jumping.

name: Evoker
description: Woodland mansion spellcaster. Summons fangs and vexes. Drops totem of undying (100% chance).

name: Vex
description: Ghostly Evoker minion. Phases through blocks. 2-minute lifespan. Drops nothing.

name: Vindicator
description: Axe-wielding mansion illager. Attacks villagers/iron golems. Drops emeralds (50% chance).

name: Illusioner
description: Unused illager with invisibility spells. Only spawns via commands. Shoots spectral arrows.

name: Minecart with Command Block
description: Redstone component minecart. Executes commands when activated. Requires operator permissions.

name: Boat
description: Wooden watercraft. Breaks into planks/sticks on impact. Fishes automatically in biomes with high fish density.

name: Minecart
description: Basic rail vehicle. Speed depends on rail type (powered rails boost speed). Pushes entities on collision.

name: Storage Minecart
description: Minecart with 27-slot inventory. Links to hoppers for automatic loading/unloading. Requires flat rails.

name: Powered Minecart
description: Coal-powered minecart. Right-click with fuel to accelerate. Pushes other minecarts.

name: Minecart with TNT
description: Explosive rail vehicle. Detonates via activator rail or fire. Breaks blocks in 4-block radius.

name: Minecart with Hopper
description: Item-collecting minecart. Pulls items from above containers. Transfers 1 item/sec to adjacent hoppers.

name: Minecart with Spawner
description: Mobile monster spawner. Requires creative mode. Spawns mobs based on contained spawn egg.

name: Creeper
description: Explosive green mob. Detonates after 1.5s fuse (damage scales with proximity). Charged variant during thunderstorms deals 2x damage. Drops gunpowder (0-2).

name: Skeleton
description: Bow-wielding undead. Burns in sunlight. 22.5% chance to drop bow (enchanted in Hard mode). Converts to stray in powder snow.

name: Spider
description: Hostile arachnid that climbs walls and attacks in dark areas. Drops string (0-2) and spider eyes (33% chance). Burns in sunlight unless under blocks.

name: Giant Zombie
description: Unused mob (12-block tall zombie). Only spawnable via commands. Deals massive damage but has no AI.

name: Zombie
description: Common undead mob. Burns in sunlight. Converts villagers to zombie villagers. Drops rotten flesh (0-2) and rarely iron ingots.

name: Slime
description: Bouncy cube that splits into smaller slimes when killed. Size determines health/drops. Drops slimeballs (0-2), essential for sticky pistons.

name: Ghast
description: Floating Nether mob that shoots explosive fireballs. Deflect projectiles with melee attacks. Drops ghast tears (0-1) and gunpowder.

name: Zombie Pigman
description: Neutral Nether mob (legacy name: now called 'Zombified Piglin'). Attacks if harmed. Drops gold nuggets (0-1) and rotten flesh.

name: Enderman
description: Tall neutral mob that teleports. Avoid eye contact to prevent aggression. Drops ender pearls (0-1) used for End access.

name: Cave Spider
description: Smaller, poisonous spider variant in mineshafts. Inflicts Poison (0:07). Drops spider eyes (33% chance).

name: Silverfish
description: Tiny mob hiding in monster eggs (infested blocks). Summons others when attacked. Drops nothing.

name: Blaze
description: Nether fortress mob that shoots fireballs. Weak to water/snowballs. Drops blaze rods (0-1), essential for brewing.

name: Magma Cube
description: Nether lava slime. Splits into smaller cubes when killed. Drops magma cream (0-1) for fire resistance potions.

name: Ender Dragon
description: Final boss of Minecraft. Destroy End Crystals first to prevent healing. Drops 12,000 XP and dragon egg. Respawns with crystals.

name: Wither
description: Summoned boss (3 wither skulls + 4 soul sand). Shoots explosive skulls. Drops nether star for beacons. Destroys most blocks.

name: Bat
description: Passive cave mob. Flies erratically. Drops nothing. Indicates nearby caves.

name: Witch
description: Swamp-dwelling mob that throws harmful potions. Drops sticks, glowstone, and healing potions. Immune to poison.

name: Endermite
description: Tiny pest from ender pearls. Hated by Endermen. Drops nothing. Despawns after 2 minutes.

name: Guardian
description: Underwater mob in ocean monuments. Shoots lasers. Drops prismarine shards/crystals. Elder Guardian inflicts Mining Fatigue.

name: Shulker
description: End city mob that hides in shells. Shoots levitation projectiles. Drops shulker shells (50% chance) for portable storage.

name: Pig
description: Passive mob. Rideable with saddle. Attracted to carrots. Drops porkchops (1-3) when killed.

name: Sheep
description: Wool-producing mob. Shear for wool or dye for colored variants. Drops mutton (1-2) when killed.

name: Cow
description: Source of leather, milk, and beef. Drops 1-3 raw beef. Use bucket for milk (cures status effects).

name: Chicken
description: Lays eggs every 5-10 minutes. Drops feathers (0-2) and raw chicken. Baby chickens follow adults.

name: Squid
description: Aquatic mob. Emits ink when attacked. Drops ink sacs (1-3) for dye. Cannot survive out of water.

name: Wolf
description: Tamable mob. Heal with meat. Attacks skeletons and hostile mobs when tamed. Drops nothing.

name: Mooshroom
description: Mushroom-covered cow from mushroom biomes. Shear for mushrooms. Drops red mushrooms when killed.

name: Snow Golem
description: Utility mob built with pumpkins and snow. Throws snowballs at enemies. Melts in warm biomes/rain.

name: Ocelot
description: Shy jungle cat. Tame with raw fish to create a cat. Scares away creepers and phantoms.

name: Iron Golem
description: Protects villagers. Crafted with iron blocks and pumpkin. Drops iron ingots (3-5) and poppies.

name: Horse
description: Rideable mob with variable speed/jump stats. Breed with golden apples. Armor reduces damage.

name: Rabbit
description: Fast hopper in deserts/flower forests. Drops rabbit hide (0-1) and rare rabbit’s foot (10% chance).

name: Polar Bear
description: Neutral mob in icy biomes. Attacks if cubs are nearby. Drops fish (0-2). Cannot be tamed.

name: Llama
description: Caravan mob. Equip with carpets. Spits when angered. Drops leather (0-2). Can carry chests.

name: Llama Spit
description: Projectile from llamas. Deals 1 heart damage. No drops. Despawns quickly.

name: Parrot
description: Tamable bird. Mimics mob sounds. Dance to music discs. Feed cookies to kill (toxic).

name: Villager
description: Trading NPC. Professions include farmer, librarian, and blacksmith. Cured zombie villagers offer discounts.

name: Ender Crystal
description: Heals the Ender Dragon. Destroy to progress the fight. Explodes violently when broken.
